application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Conditions 8 (Flood Risk Assessment/Sustainable Drainage Systems Strategy) and 10 (Trees and landscaping) of planning permission 22/04030 (Variation of Condition 2 (Compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission PP/21/04106 (Demolition of side and rear extension to main building and bay window to coach house. Erection of single storey side extension to coach house and full height side extension to main building. Erection of rear extension at upper ground floor level and  excavation under part of main building, front and main garden and coach house to form basement extension. Alterations to coach house and main house roofs and facades. Replacement windows and new glazed openings. Internal refurbishment throughout) to allow increase in size of basement from as shown on the consented plans).
